ModMetaData.name: Quality Affects HP
ModMetaData.author: Fluxilis
ModMetaData.description:
[Previously called German Quality] Makes quality affects Hitpoints of things, so higher quality means that items like armor last longer.
Hp factors are: Awful: x0.5 Poor: x0.75 Normal: x1 Good: x1.75 Excellent: x3 Masterwork: x6 Legendary: x10
With 1.6, there may occasionally be small rounding errors. Meaning some items may have a few hit points more or fewer than the maxHP. I'll hopefully be able to fix this in an update soon.
